name: qcg.qcg-broker
description:
QCG-Broker is a successor of the Grid Resource Management System (GRMS)
project. QCG-Broker was designed to be an open-source meta-scheduling
framework that allows developers to build and easily deploy resource
management systems to control large-scale distributed computing
infrastructures running queuing or batch systems locally.
changeLog:
QCG-broker:
  support for parameter sweep jobs
  changes in handling data transfers
  improvements in brokering algorithms: new resource filters
  integration with BDII information system (qcg-broker-egi-is-provider package).
  bug fixes 
QCG-broker-client:
  support for parameter sweep jobs (#QCG parameter-sweep directive)
  changes in #QCG assistant, monitor, watch-output directives (integration with QCG-Monitoring service)
  new #QCG mount directive (integration with VeilFS system - PLGrid only)
  new qcg-version command displaying version of the qcg package
  bug fixes
